result.ponchtml: Tá de ḃua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeaċt ó ṗóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.

result.eng: The company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.orig: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.html: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart don ċoṁlaċt seo a ċur in iúl dúinn sé ṁí ó ẛinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.

result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ga: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.orig: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.html: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫiteann sin amaċ ċoṁ minic anois agus a ṫitfeaḋ blianta beaga ó ẛinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.

result.eng: Two jets flew in from the United States.
result.ga: D'eitil dhá scairdeitleán isteach ó na Stáit Aontaithe

result.html: D'eitil dhá scairdeitleán isteach ó na Stáit AontaitheTwo jets flew in from the United States.
result.ponchtml: D'eitil ḋá scairdeitleán isteaċ ó na Stáit AontaiṫeTwo jets flew in from the United States.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: The next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ga: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.orig: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.html: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág na coṁarsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó ẛinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.

result.eng: They remembered the priests going from farm to farm.
result.ga: Ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirm
result.orig: Ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirm
result.html: Ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirmThey remembered the priests going from farm to farm.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċuiṁin leo na sagairt ag dul ó ḟeirm go feirmThey remembered the priests going from farm to farm.

result.eng: Some ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
result.ga: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag
result.orig: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag

result.ponchtml: Beagnaċ deiċ mbliana ó ẛin d'éiriġ mé as an leaba in árasán beagSome ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.

result.eng: Why was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ga: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.orig: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.html: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimhWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ an raiḃ deataċ ag teaċt ó ḋá ṫaoḃ an ḟoirgniṁWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?

result.eng: My daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ga: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.orig: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.html: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ponchtml: Meaḃrú laeṫúil ó ẛin dom ar na huafáis a ċonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ga: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.orig: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.html: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ponchtml: Traiḋfil blianta ó ẛin ḃíoṫas ag caint ar ḃreacaḋ ré úr do na meáin ċumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.

result.eng: All you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.
result.ga: Ciúnas na reilige a bhí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoi
result.orig: Ciúnas na reilige a bhí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoi
result.html: Ciúnas na reilige a bhí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoiAll you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.
result.ponchtml: Ciúnas na reilige a ḃí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoiAll you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: You wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ga: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.orig: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne

result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeifeá ag súil leis an doiṁneaċt ċéanna tuairimíoċta uaṫu is a ḃeaḋ ó ṗostálaċa níba ḟaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.

result.eng: I was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ga: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin

result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ mo ċéad ċuairt ar Ṁeiriceá i gcuiṁne dom blianta fada ó ẛinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.

result.eng: Cane was planted in the Caribbean area and cotton further west and north.

result.eng: You have the children all confused, if I must say so.

result.eng: He was six foot tall.

result.eng: Shut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.

result.ponchtml: Druid do ḃéal ó do ċuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
